long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Skim AI - Chrome Extension

Elevate Your Studying with the World's Best Personal Tutor—Including Generative AI, Summary Tools, and More.

Skim for Chrome offers real-time assistance to help you digest and understand all your academic material to achieve the best grades possible. 

With comprehensive features for summarizing, generating insights, and highlighting key points, Skim is more than just an educational tool. It’s your partner in understanding complex information quickly and effectively. Skim’s generative AI capabilities allow you to produce instant summaries, insights, and more wherever you read online content.

*➤ How It Works*
 Skim analyses your academic content stored in Google Drive, enabling you to interact with a personal tutor. With just one click, you can search for information and gain a deeper understanding of your Google Drive documents, as if you have the world's best personal assistant at your service.

*➤ What’s Included?*

~ *Free*
The free version of Skim includes an studying assistance designed to help you comprehend content more effectively.

- Summary generator
- Regenerate response
- Insight generator
- Generative AI features

*➤ Works Where You work*
Skim is designed to work seamlessly in your browser—no downloading or uploading required. Skim for Chrome works across:

- Google Workspace ecosystem
- All Readable PDF documents
- Text files
- Microsoft word
